Classified Skins.name: M4A1-S | Hot Rod
Classified Skins.desc: It has been painted with a chrome base coat and candied in transparent red anodized effect paint.

Classified Skins.name: Glock-18 | Twilight Galaxy
Classified Skins.desc: It has been painted with metal flake paint.
Classified Skins.lore: Stars are just pin pricks at the darkness

Restricted Skins.name: Dual Berettas | Duelist
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been given painted mother-of-pearl grips and a dark forced patina.

Restricted Skins.name: SG 553 | Bulldozer
Restricted Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a production line yellow color scheme.
Restricted Skins.lore: This bone crusher is a devastator

Mil-Spec Skins.name: P250 | Whiteout
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: It looks pure, but looks can be deceiving

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MAC-10 | Fade
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted by airbrushing transparent paints that fade together over a chrome base coat.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: This isn't just a weapon, it's a conversation piece - Imogen, Arms Dealer In Training

Mil-Spec Skins.name: CZ75-Auto | Emerald
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted with a chrome base coat and candied in transparent emerald anodized effect paint.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: This is what the great Sebastien Hennequet has been reduced to? A nagging school marm? What happened to you... - The Teacher and The Iconoclast Part 2

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Five-SeveN | Nitro
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted black and tangerine orange.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Rona is as good as she thinks she is... she's just not old enough to realize she shouldn't point it out to everyone - Felix Riley, Commanding Officer

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MP7 | Full Stop
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted using a VariCamo patterned hydrographic.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Rebuilding only comes in the wake of destruction

Industrial Grade Skins.name: USP-S | Para Green
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a khaki green and black color scheme.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Who he was doesn't change who he has become. Don't worry Felix... I'll stop him - The Paladin and The Teacher Part 2

Industrial Grade Skins.name: Galil AR | Urban Rubble
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a VariCamo patterned hydrographic.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Rebuilding only comes in the wake of destruction

Industrial Grade Skins.name: Desert Eagle | Night
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a night ops color scheme.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: It's the whisper of the wind... it's the bite at your neck

Consumer Grade Skins.name: SCAR-20 | Army Sheen
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been covered in a metallic foil stamped with a camouflage pattern.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: CZ75-Auto | Army Sheen
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been covered in a metallic foil stamped with a camouflage pattern.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: MAG-7 | Seabird
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in an aqua and tan color scheme.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: M249 | Impact Drill
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a blue and orange color scheme.
